mapper.select: SELECT Id AS "Id", Title AS "Title", Content AS "Content", mark AS mark, is_top AS is_top, DATE_FORMAT(MessageDate,'%M %D,%Y') AS "MessageDate", author AS "author" FROM tb_notice WHERE Id = #{Id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_notice( Title, Content, MessageDate, mark, is_top, author, province_id, city_id, area_id ) VALUES ( #{entity.Title}, #{entity.Content}, NOW(), #{entity.mark}, #{entity.is_top}, #{entity.author}, #{entity.proId},#{entity.cityId}, #{entity.areaId} )
